title: Grademate
description: An app to save and manage your grades and calculate your average during the school year</br></br>This app was developed to solve the problem of removing averages from the school's electronic register

title: Terralink
description: An app designed for the citizens of Bolzano that allows them to have all the services at their fingertips

title: Linker
description: An app to save and organize your links easily

title: Trackmate
description: An app to view, save and categorize your GPX tracks

title: Absence Screen
description: A data management infrastructure used to manage teacher absences via a mobile app and a web dashboard
